billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Establishes a re-entry employment incentive tax credit
summary: Establishes a re-entry employment incentive tax credit for employers who hire individuals who have been released from correctional facilities in this state for full-time employment at a rate that is 140% of the state minimum wage.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing a re-entry employment incentive tax credit; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
